title: [FSX] Flight1 BN-2 Islander v1.6
description:
While this is a relatively old aircraft from Flight1, it is still quite an enjoyable one IMHO. The version which is floating around the internet is generally v1.10, which is older and buggier, so I decided to upload the latest version (v1.6) for you pirates.

For those who want to study the KLN 90A in more detail, I have included the real world manuals from Bendix-King. These manuals were up-to-date at the time I uploaded this package here.

For those who are tired of BN-2's blue panel and want to try something different, I have included the latest version of Frank Safranek's alternative panels for BN-2 Islander. Refer to their Readme files for more info.

Unfortunately, this aircraft has an annoying clicking sound bug. This problem occurs due to a faulty wind sound file which comes with the original installer. To solve it, I prepared a "fix" for you and included it in the package. Do NOT forget to apply it after the installation is complete.

Seed and enjoy!
